thread.title: Portland cartoonist creating a book of illustrated Donald Trump tweets
thread.title_full: Portland cartoonist creating a book of illustrated Donald Trump tweets

author: Lizzy Acker | The Oregonian/OregonLive
title: Portland cartoonist creating a book of illustrated Donald Trump tweets
text: Shannon Wheeler, a Portland cartoonist whose work has appeared in The Onion newspaper and The New Yorker magazine, has a new book coming out this August. But he didn't write the captions for these comics -- those he took directly from the Twitter account of the Commander and Chief of the United States of America, President Donald Tump.
